document.full_text: after avoiding nuclear obliteration in a u.s. air force accident, the village of palomares is hopeful that the u.s. and madrid will finally clean up contaminated land.
document.title: spain and u.s. near accord on atomic cleanup
lines_and_colors: after avoiding nuclear obliteration in a u.s. air force accident, the village of palomares is hopeful that the u.s. and madrid will finally clean up contaminated land.
